Package ohos.agp.components

Class MagicLayout.LayoutConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
      • ohos.agp.components.MagicLayout.LayoutConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    MagicLayout

    public static class MagicLayout.LayoutConfig
extends ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
    Specifies the layout parameters for components in a MagicLayout.
    Since:
    5

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int referenceSize
      Indicates the line wrapping reference size.
      static int UNSPECIFIED_HIDE_PRIORITY
      Indicates the default hide priority.
      static int UNSPECIFIED_REFERENCE_SIZE
      Indicate the default value for the line wrapping reference size, which equals the width of a component and its margins.

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig

        height, MATCH_CONTENT, MATCH_PARENT, width

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LayoutConfig​()
      Default constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance, with the default width and height being ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig#MATCH_CONTENT.
      LayoutConfig​(int width, int height)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the specified width and height.
      LayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance, using the parameters of the parent layout.
      LayoutConfig​(MagicLayout.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance, using the parameters (including the width, height, paddings, margins, alignment mode, and line wrapping reference size) of the current MagicLayout.
      LayoutConfig​(Context context, AttrSet attrSet)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the specified application context and attribute set.

    • Field Detail

      • UNSPECIFIED_HIDE_PRIORITY

        public static final int UNSPECIFIED_HIDE_PRIORITY
        Indicates the default hide priority.
        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNSPECIFIED_REFERENCE_SIZE

        public static final int UNSPECIFIED_REFERENCE_SIZE
        Indicate the default value for the line wrapping reference size, which equals the width of a component and its margins.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • referenceSize

        public int referenceSize
        Indicates the line wrapping reference size. If the sum of the line wrapping reference size of a new component and those of the existing components in the current line exceeds the total width of the layout, this component will be put to the next line.
        Since:
        5

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​()
        Default constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance, with the default width and height being ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig#MATCH_CONTENT.
        Since:
        5

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(Context context,
                    AttrSet attrSet)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the specified application context and attribute set.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        attrSet - Indicates the attribute set to use.
        Since:
        5

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(int width,
                    int height)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width to set.
        height - Indicates the height to set.
        Since:
        5

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance, using the parameters of the parent layout.

        Default values for the paddings, margins, alignment mode, and line wrapping reference size (represented by referenceSize) are used.

        Parameters:
        source - Indicates the parameters of the parent layout.
        Since:
        5

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(MagicLayout.LayoutConfig source)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance, using the parameters (including the width, height, paddings, margins, alignment mode, and line wrapping reference size) of the current MagicLayout.
        Parameters:
        source - Indicates the parameters of the current MagicLayout.
        Since:
        5

        Returns:
        Returns the width ratio.
        Since:
        7

      • setScaleRatioOfParentWidth

        public void setScaleRatioOfParentWidth​(float widthRatio)
        Sets the ratio of the width of a scaled component to the width of its parent MagicLayout.
        Parameters:
        widthRatio - Indicates the width ratio, within the range [0.0, 1.0].
        Since:
        7

      • setHidePriority

        public void setHidePriority​(int hidePriority)
